secrets.passphraseComplexityRequired: Me whai i ngā pūmatua, pūiti, tau, me te tohu
secrets.theyll_appear_here_once_youve_shared_the: Ka puta mai ki konei i te wā kua tuaritia e koe.
secrets.recipient_delivery_is_optional: He kōwhiringa te tuku ki te kaiwhiwhi
secrets.sample_secret_content_this_could_be_sens: Tauira ihirangi karere huna Ka taea tēnei te raraunga tairongo Ko tētahi karere maha-rārangi rānei
secrets.secret_content_copied_to_clipboard: Kua tāruatia te ihirangi karere huna ki te papatopenga
secrets.secret_value_not_available: Kāore e wātea te uara karere huna
secrets.you_can_safely_close_this_tab: Ka taea e koe te kati i tēnei matapihi ina oti.
secrets.enter_the_secret_content_here: Tāurua te ihirangi karere huna ki konei
secrets.enter_the_secret_content_to_share_here: Tāurua te ihirangi karere huna hei tuari ki konei
secrets.when_ready_click_the_view_secret_button_: Ina reri, pāwhiri te pātene i te tihi o te whārangi hei whakaatu i tō karere kotahi-wā.
secrets.what_happens_next: He aha te mea e whai ake nei?
secrets.yes_after_viewing_the_secret_is_permanen: Āe. Whai muri i te tirohanga, ka mukua pūmautia te karere huna mai i ā mātou tūmau, kia whakaū i tō matatapu.
secrets.onetime_secret_is_a_secure_way_to_share_: Ko Onetime Secret te huarahi haumaru ki te tuari i ngā mōhiohio tairongo e whakangaromia-anō whai muri i te tirohanga kotahi.
secrets.before_you_open_it_heres_what_you_should: I mua i tō huaki, anei te mea me mōhio koe:
secrets.a_secure_one_time_message_awaits_you: E tatari ana tētahi karere kotahi-wā, haumaru ki a koe.
secrets.auto_expire_after_viewing: Aunoa-pau whai muri i te tirohanga
secrets.that_information_is_no_longer_available: Kua tirohia, kua pau rānei tēnei karere huna.

private.this_msg_is_encrypted: Kua muhumuhua tēnei karere ki tō kupu karapa.
private.only_see_once: Kia tūpato: ka kitea tēnei kotahi anake.
private.created_success: Kua hangaia angitutia te karere huna!
private.created_success_key: Kua hangaia angitutia te karere huna {shortKey}!
private.created_securely: Kua hangaia haumaru tō karere huna
private.have_more_questions_visit_our: He pātai anō? Toro ki tā mātou
private.the_burn_feature_lets_you_permanently_de: Ko te āhuatanga whakawareware ka tuku i a koe ki te muku pūmau i tētahi karere huna i mua i te tirohanga o tētahi. He mea whai hua tēnei mēnā me whakakore te urunga, i tuari rānei i ngā mōhiohio hē. Ina whakawarekia, kāore e taea te whakahoki i te karere huna.
private.your_secret_will_remain_available_for_re: Ka noho wātea tonu tō karere huna mō {0}, tae noa rānei ki te wā ka tirohia, ko tēhea e tae tuatahi ana. Whai muri i te tutuki o tētahi o ngā āhuatanga, ka mukua pūmautia te karere huna.
private.how_does_secret_expiration_work: Me pēhea te mahi o te paunga karere huna?
private.for_security_reasons_we_cant_recover_los: Mō ngā take haumaru, kāore e taea e mātou te whakahoki mai i ngā hononga karere huna ngaro. Me waihanga e koe he karere huna hou, me hanga hoki he hononga hou. Ka tūtohu mātou kia tāruahia te hononga i te wā tonu i muri i te hanganga.
private.lost_your_secret_link: Kua ngaro tō hononga karere huna?
private.we_display_the_value_for_you_so_that_you: Ka whakaatu mātou i te uara ki a koe kia taea ai e koe te whakaū engari ka mahia kotahi tēnā, nō reira ki te whiwhi tētahi i tēnei whārangi tūmataiti (i tō hītori pūtirotiro, mehemea rānei ka tuku matapokorere koe i te hononga tūmataiti kaua ko te hononga karere huna), kāore rātou e kite i te uara karere huna.
private.why_can_i_only_see_the_secret_value_once: He aha ka kitea kotahi noa e au te uara karere huna?
private.burning_a_secret_permanently_deletes_it_: Ko te whakawareware i tētahi karere huna ka muku pūmau i mua i te pānuitanga o tētahi. Ka kite te kaiwhiwhi i tētahi karere e tohu ana kāore te karere huna i te tīari. He mea whai hua tēnei mēnā ka tuari pohewa koe i ngā mōhiohio hē, me ārai rānei te urunga.
private.what_happens_when_i_burn_a_secret: He aha ka puta ina whakawaretia e au tētahi karere huna?
private.and_never_stored_in_its_original_form_th: ā, kāore i te rokiroki i tōna āhua taketake. Ko tēnei huarahi ko tō tikanga kāore e taea e mātou te uru, te whakahoki rānei i tō karere huna - ko te tangata anake me te kupu karapa tika ka taea.
private.each_secret_can_only_be_viewed_once_afte: Ka taea te tiro kotahi noa ia karere huna. Whai muri i te tirohanga, ka mukua pūmautia mai i ā mātou tūmau. Ka whakaū tēnei kāore e kitea pokerehia ō mōhiohio tairongo mā te hītori pūtirotiro, mā ngā hononga tūmataiti hē rānei.

shared.requires_passphrase: Me whai kupu karapa tēnei karere:
shared.viewed_own_secret: Kua tirohia e koe tō ake karere huna. Kāore i te wātea mō tētahi atu.
shared.you_created_this_secret: Nāu i hanga tēnei karere huna. Ki te tirohia e koe, kāore e kite te kaiwhiwhi.
shared.reply_with_secret: Whakautu ki tētahi atu karere huna
shared.pre_reveal_default: Pāwhiri te pātene ki raro hei whakaatu i tō karere haumaru.
shared.post_reveal_default: Kei raro nei tō karere haumaru.
